pullrequest.title: Adding xacro parameter to specify task name in plugin

content.raw:
Running

‌

```
roslaunch vrx_gazebo dock.launch
rostopic echo /vrx/task/info
```

still produces 

‌

```
name: "scan_dock"
state: "running"
ready_time:
  secs: 3
  nsecs:         0
running_time:
  secs: 6
  nsecs:         0
elapsed_time:
  secs: 22
  nsecs:         0
remaining_time:
  secs: 278n
  secs:         0
timed_out: False
score: 0.0
```

I think this is set in the dock.world.xacro.

Is this a problem or is there another way to test this PR?
